name: Senior Financial Analyst - Claims
description: Analyzes financial performance and trends related to claims operations, supporting cost management and profitability optimization across life, health, and P&C lines of business. Works closely with claims leadership to forecast expenses and identify process improvement opportunities.

name: Financial Analyst - Underwriting & Pricing
description: Evaluates financial impact of underwriting decisions and pricing strategies, analyzing loss ratios, premium adequacy, and profitability by risk segment. Supports AI model validation and financial outcomes of automated underwriting implementations.

name: Annual Budget Manager
description: Leads the annual budgeting process for assigned business units, consolidating departmental submissions, analyzing variances, and presenting budget recommendations to senior leadership. Manages budget cycles and coordinates with finance business partners.

name: Operational Budget Analyst
description: Monitors monthly and quarterly budget performance across operational departments, investigates significant variances, and provides forecasting updates. Supports digital transformation initiatives by tracking technology investment budgets and ROI metrics.

name: Fixed Income Investment Analyst
description: Analyzes bond portfolios and fixed income securities to optimize yield and manage interest rate risk for Acme's investment portfolio. Evaluates credit quality and duration strategies aligned with insurance liability profiles.

name: Equity & Alternative Investments Analyst
description: Evaluates equity securities, real estate, and alternative investment opportunities to support portfolio diversification and return objectives. Conducts fundamental analysis and monitors performance against benchmarks.

name: Senior Portfolio Manager - Fixed Income
description: Manages multi-billion dollar fixed income investment portfolio, making strategic allocation decisions and overseeing day-to-day trading activities. Ensures portfolio alignment with regulatory capital requirements and liability matching strategies.

name: Portfolio Manager - Equity & Alternatives
description: Oversees equity and alternative investment allocations, managing relationships with external fund managers and monitoring performance. Balances risk-return objectives with regulatory and liquidity constraints.

name: Senior Accountant - General Ledger
description: Manages general ledger accounting, journal entries, and account reconciliations for multiple business units. Ensures accuracy of financial records and supports month-end and year-end close processes.

name: Insurance Accounting Specialist
description: Handles insurance-specific accounting including premium revenue recognition, loss reserve accounting, and reinsurance accounting. Ensures compliance with GAAP and insurance regulatory accounting principles.

name: Accounts Payable Manager
description: Oversees accounts payable operations, managing vendor relationships, payment processing, and reconciliation of payables. Leads process improvements and automation initiatives for AP workflows.

name: Accounts Payable Specialist
description: Processes vendor invoices, matches to purchase orders and receipts, and processes payments. Resolves discrepancies and maintains vendor master data in accounting systems.

name: Financial Reporting Manager
description: Leads preparation of consolidated financial statements and management reporting packages for internal and external stakeholders. Oversees financial close processes and coordinates with external auditors.

name: Financial Reporting Analyst
description: Prepares financial statements, variance analyses, and management reports; reconciles subsidiary ledgers and investigates accounting issues. Supports quarterly and annual reporting cycles.

name: Regulatory Reporting Manager
description: Manages regulatory filings and statutory reporting requirements across state insurance departments and federal regulators. Ensures compliance with evolving regulatory standards and coordinates with compliance and audit functions.

name: Statutory Accounting Specialist
description: Prepares statutory financial statements and regulatory filings using SAP and specialized insurance reporting systems. Maintains knowledge of state-specific accounting rules and regulatory changes.

name: Senior Treasury Analyst
description: Manages corporate liquidity, debt issuance, and capital structure optimization. Analyzes funding strategies and manages relationships with banks and rating agencies.

name: Treasury Analyst - Investments & Funding
description: Monitors short-term investments, manages debt portfolios, and analyzes funding requirements. Supports cash forecasting and coordinates with investment management on liquidity needs.

name: Cash Management Manager
description: Oversees daily cash management operations, bank account management, and payment processing across the organization. Optimizes cash positioning and manages banking relationships.

name: Cash Operations Specialist
description: Processes daily cash receipts and disbursements, reconciles bank accounts, and monitors cash positions. Supports implementation of automated payment and collection systems.
